text: makkalil cilar avarkalitam; "titamaka makkalil (palar unkalutan porituvatarkakat) tirantu vittarkal, enave appataiyaipparri ancik kollunkal" enru kuri(accurutti)nar;. Anal (itu) avarkalin imanaip perukki valuppatac ceytatu. "Allahve enkalukkup potumanavan. Avane enkalukkuc ciranta patukavalan" enru avarkal kurinarkal
